title: Add authenticated Meeting History, Recent Meetings, and Member Search pages with search and navigation

requirements.summary: Add/validate an authenticated “Meeting History” page that lists all meetings with case-insensitive title/description search and clear UI states.
acceptanceCriteria: When signed in, users can navigate to a page titled “Meeting History”.
The page renders a search input with placeholder text in English.
Typing in the search input filters the rendered meeting list by meeting.title OR meeting.description (case-insensitive).
The page shows appropriate UI states for: loading, backend error, no meetings at all, and no results for the current search query.

file_operations.description: Ensure the Meeting History page meets the required UI states and implements case-insensitive filtering by meeting title/description; continue composing existing shadcn-ui primitives (e.g., Input/Card/Alert) without modifying frontend/src/components/ui. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Add a small shared helper for consistent case-insensitive matching (e.g., normalize strings and guard against empty queries) to reuse across meeting/member search pages.

requirements.summary: Add/validate an authenticated “Recent Meetings” page showing a deterministic bounded subset (latest 10) with case-insensitive search within that subset and clear UI states.
acceptanceCriteria: When signed in, users can navigate to a page titled “Recent Meetings”.
The page displays a bounded recent subset (e.g., latest 10) derived deterministically from the meetings dataset.
Typing in the search input filters only the recent subset by meeting.title OR meeting.description (case-insensitive).
The page shows appropriate UI states for: loading, backend error, no meetings at all, and no results for the current search query within the recent subset.

file_operations.description: Ensure Recent Meetings deterministically derives a bounded subset (e.g., sort by id desc then slice 10) and filters only within that subset case-insensitively by title/description, with loading/error/empty/no-results states; keep using composed shadcn-ui components. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Reuse/extend the shared text search helper as needed for meeting title/description matching consistency across History and Recent pages.

requirements.summary: Add/validate an authenticated “Member Search” page that lists members and supports case-insensitive search by username with clear UI states.
acceptanceCriteria: When signed in, users can navigate to a page titled “Member Search” (or “Search Members”).
The page renders a search input with placeholder text in English.
Typing in the search input filters the rendered member list by username (case-insensitive).
The page shows appropriate UI states for: loading, backend error, no members at all, and no results for the current search query.

file_operations.description: Ensure Member Search filters usernames case-insensitively and clearly renders loading/error/empty/no-results states; continue composing existing shadcn-ui primitives (Input/Card/Alert/Badge) without modifying frontend/src/components/ui. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
Apply the shared case-insensitive match helper for username filtering to keep search behavior consistent.

requirements.summary: Expose signed-in navigation entry points to Meeting History, Recent Meetings, and Member Search, and prevent unauthenticated access with a sign-in prompt.
acceptanceCriteria: When signed in, the header navigation includes access to Meeting History and Recent Meetings under a Meetings navigation area.
When signed in, the header navigation includes access to Member Search under a Members navigation area.
Unauthenticated users cannot access these pages and are prompted to sign in instead.

file_operations.description: Update/confirm signed-in header navigation includes Meetings area links to Recent Meetings + Meeting History and Members area link to Member Search; keep composing existing shadcn-ui dropdown primitives; do not edit frontend/src/components/ui. Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Wire/confirm view registrations for Meeting History, Recent Meetings, and Member Search and ensure they are protected behind the existing signed-in gating; unauthenticated access must show a sign-in prompt consistent with the authorization/authentication flow (useInternetIdentity + cached query clearing on logout). Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
